game.beginning: You wake up in a mysterious room with no memory of how you got there. As you explore your surroundings, you discover cryptic clues and hidden messages left behind by a previous occupant. With each puzzle you solve, your memories slowly start to return, revealing a dangerous secret lurking within the walls of the room. You must unlock the truth and escape before it's too late.
game.ending: After solving the final puzzle, you uncover the truth behind your amnesia and the dark secret of the room. With the knowledge regained, you break free from the room just as it collapses behind you. As you step into the sunlight, a wave of relief washes over you, knowing that you are finally free from the clutches of the past.
game.synopsis: Embark on a thrilling adventure as you unravel the mystery of your past and escape from a deadly room full of secrets. Use your wit and intelligence to decipher clues, overcome challenges, and regain your memory. Will you discover the truth in time or be trapped forever?
game.title: The Room of Shadows
